tab1.title: Instructions
tab1.warningInstructions: Using the Face++ service has severe privacy implications. Use at own risk. Read and understand your local privacy legislation, and the terms of use from Face++
tab1.registerInstructions: For a free API key, go to console.faceplusplus.com/register
tab1.manageInstructions: After adding the API keys in the settings tab, you can start adding photo's of known persons. These will be used for face recognition.
tab1.useTitle: How to use in a flow
tab1.useInstructions: Use a flow to send a camera image to the app. The app will try to find faces in this image, and will trigger a flowcard for each face it finds. Note that faces will only be discovered when they are (almost) frontal, and large enough (>75 pixels wide).

tab3.title: Settings
tab3.instructions:
Enter the API Key and API Secret that you obtained from the Face++ website.
A higher threshold will reduce false face matches.

tab4.title: Faces
tab4.instructions: Each reference image must contain only one face. Minimum 250x250px, max 500KB file. The label you add will be used in flows on detection.
tab4.label: Label this person
